description: After a winning slow-cooker recipe? Give this Hainanese chicken rice recipe a go. You can't go wrong with slow-cooked chicken, fragrant broth and fluffy rice.
name: SlowCooker Hainanese Chicken Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove and discard chicken skin and bones. Thickly slice chicken. Divide rice mixture among bowls and arrange chicken on top. Top with cucumber and coriander, and scatter over chilli and extra onion. Drizzle with kecap manis and spoon on a little onion sauce. Serve.
